feed.title: Dokploy Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Dokploy: v0.18.0
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • feat(template): added shlink, a url shortener service by @nktnet1 in https://github.com/Dokploy/dokploy/pull/1226
  • fix(template): shlink version stable in index.ts by @nktnet1 in https://github.com/Dokploy/dokploy/pull/1229
  • feat: upgrade listmonk version by @jannismilz in https://github.com/Dokploy/dokploy/pull/1231
  • fix: teable template by @muhammetakalan in https://github.com/Dokploy/dokploy/pull/1232
  • feat(template): added evolution api by @joaotonaco in https://github.com/Dokploy/dokploy/pull/1114
  • feat(template): add Formbricks template with Docker Compose and environment setup by @bernabedev in https://github.com/Dokploy/dokploy/pull/1237
  • Feat: added env support to Dokploy stack compose by @xenonwellz in https://github.com/Dokploy/dokploy/pull/637
  • chore: remove duplicated sentence in projects dialog by @MuhammadM1998 in https://github.com/Dokploy/dokploy/pull/1250
  • feat: added clipboard functionality to copy IP address from badge in services pages by @vishalkadam47 in https://github.com/Dokploy/dokploy/pull/1238
  • feat: Updated PocketBase version to 0.25.0 by @Blueshadow58 in https://github.com/Dokploy/dokploy/pull/1259
  • fix: improve domains page UX and button placement consistency by @ali-issa in https://github.com/Dokploy/dokploy/pull/1249
  • fix: expose docker stack services by @mateodemuynck in https://github.com/Dokploy/dokploy/pull/1252
  • refactor: update docker stats by @Siumauricio in https://github.com/Dokploy/dokploy/pull/1262
  • fix: don't cut log by @Siumauricio in https://github.com/Dokploy/dokploy/pull/1264
  • refactor: delete label by @Siumauricio in https://github.com/Dokploy/dokploy/pull/1265
  • Feat/monitoring cloud version by @Siumauricio in https://github.com/Dokploy/dokploy/pull/1267
  • Fix/monitoring by @Siumauricio in https://github.com/Dokploy/dokploy/pull/1271
  • fix(template): superset SQLALCHEMY_EXAMPLES_URI env + warning by @nktnet1 in https://github.com/Dokploy/dokploy/pull/1269
  • chore: update unsend image version to v1.2.5 by @mohabgabber in https://github.com/Dokploy/dokploy/pull/1268

New Contributors

  • @jannismilz made their first contribution in https://github.com/Dokploy/dokploy/pull/1231
  • @muhammetakalan made their first contribution in https://github.com/Dokploy/dokploy/pull/1232
  • @xenonwellz made their first contribution in https://github.com/Dokploy/dokploy/pull/637
  • @MuhammadM1998 made their first contribution in https://github.com/Dokploy/dokploy/pull/1250
  • @Blueshadow58 made their first contribution in https://github.com/Dokploy/dokploy/pull/1259
  • @ali-issa made their first contribution in https://github.com/Dokploy/dokploy/pull/1249
  • @mateodemuynck made their first contribution in https://github.com/Dokploy/dokploy/pull/1252

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Dokploy/dokploy/compare/v0.17.9...v0.18.0

entry.title: New release for Dokploy: v0.18.1
entry.content:
What's Changed

entry.title: New release for Dokploy: v0.18.2
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • revert "feat: Updated PocketBase version to 0.25.0" #1259 by @Blueshadow58 in https://github.com/Dokploy/dokploy/pull/1277

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Dokploy/dokploy/compare/v0.18.1...v0.18.2

entry.title: New release for Dokploy: v0.18.3
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • feat(template): frappe HR, open source HR & Payroll software by @NagariaHussain in https://github.com/Dokploy/dokploy/pull/1239
  • 1004 network conflict by @Siumauricio in https://github.com/Dokploy/dokploy/pull/1276
  • Update unsend version to v1.3.2 by @mohabgabber in https://github.com/Dokploy/dokploy/pull/1297
  • feat: added bulk actions for services start and stop and added service status for domain dropdown by @vishalkadam47 in https://github.com/Dokploy/dokploy/pull/1282

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Dokploy/dokploy/compare/v0.18.2...v0.18.3

entry.title: New release for Dokploy: v0.18.4
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • chore: update wordpress version to v6.7.1 by @vytenisstaugaitis in https://github.com/Dokploy/dokploy/pull/1307
  • feat: Add Trilium app template by @jeffersoncbd in https://github.com/Dokploy/dokploy/pull/1309
  • feat(template): update plausible by @mezotv in https://github.com/Dokploy/dokploy/pull/1316
  • feat(template): add convex.dev by @mafrasil in https://github.com/Dokploy/dokploy/pull/1319
  • feat(template): add outline by @drudge in https://github.com/Dokploy/dokploy/pull/1321
  • style(monitoring): use status badges for compose monitoring by @drudge in https://github.com/Dokploy/dokploy/pull/1322
  • refactor: add missing path option by @Siumauricio in https://github.com/Dokploy/dokploy/pull/1324
  • fix: handle race condition to catch recreation base containers by @Siumauricio in https://github.com/Dokploy/dokploy/pull/1325
  • fix: inherit security & redirects from application by @Siumauricio in https://github.com/Dokploy/dokploy/pull/1326
  • feat(template): Add Appwrite template by @Krobys in https://github.com/Dokploy/dokploy/pull/1327
  • feat(template): add docker registry template by @drudge in https://github.com/Dokploy/dokploy/pull/1329
  • docs(template): note on networking for superset by @nktnet1 in https://github.com/Dokploy/dokploy/pull/1313

New Contributors

  • @vytenisstaugaitis made their first contribution in https://github.com/Dokploy/dokploy/pull/1307
  • @jeffersoncbd made their first contribution in https://github.com/Dokploy/dokploy/pull/1309
  • @Krobys made their first contribution in https://github.com/Dokploy/dokploy/pull/1327

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Dokploy/dokploy/compare/v0.18.3...v0.18.4
